DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety of intravenous (IV) cocaine in subjects taking quetiapine at 3 dosage levels.
DOC.detailed_description: A placebo-controlled, double-blind, inpatient assessment of interaction between intravenous cocaine and quetiapine (seroquel) in cocaine-experienced subjects. To assess the safety of IV cocaine in subjects taking quetiapine at 3 dosage levels.
DOC.criteria: Includes but is not limited to: nontreatment seeking individuals. Must meet DSMIV criteria for cocaine abuse or dependence. Must be able to verbalize understanding of consent and provide written informed consent and verbalize willingness to complete study procedures. Site will provide further details. Please contact site for further information
